lex.text: Aarhus Lufthavn A/S is the operation organisation of Aarhus Airport which has a runway length of 2702.0.
lex.template: PATIENT-1 is the operation organisation of AGENT-1 which has a runway length of PATIENT-2 .
lex.lexicalization: PATIENT-1 VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] be DT[form=defined] the operation organisation of AGENT-1 which VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=null] have DT[form=undefined] a runway length of PATIENT-2 .

lex.text: Aarhus Airport is operated by Aarhus Lufthavn A/S, and its runway length is 2702.0.
lex.template: AGENT-1 is operated by PATIENT-1 , and AGENT-1 runway length is PATIENT-2 .
lex.lexicalization: AGENT-1 VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=passive,person=3rd,number=singular] operate by PATIENT-1 , and AGENT-1 runway length VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] be PATIENT-2 .
